content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":233372,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一つの人生経験よ？","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a life experience, you know?"},{"lineNumber":233373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お婆ちゃんもうなんでもいい人なの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Grandma, are you just fine with anything now!?"},{"lineNumber":233374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい！　ボクも出るよー！","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes! I'll participate too!"},{"lineNumber":233375,"originalJapaneseLine":"　へへへ、パートナーは","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehehe, I've been told my partner"},{"lineNumber":233376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボクで平気って言われちゃった！」","translatedEnglishLine":"can be me, so it's okay!"},{"lineNumber":233377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それとヒーローも出るよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"And Hero will join too!"},{"lineNumber":233378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、オイラ、こういうの出たくないんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I don’t want to join something like this though..."},{"lineNumber":233379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……レリコフとザンスにーちゃんが出ろって」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... Rerikov and Zans big brother are telling me to enter."},{"lineNumber":233380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫、大丈夫！","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, it's okay!"},{"lineNumber":233381,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒーローは強いんだから勝てるよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero is strong, so we can win!"},{"lineNumber":233382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへ、この大会、むかーし、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, a long time ago,"},{"lineNumber":233383,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パットンおじさんが優勝したことあるんだよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Uncle Patton once won this tournament."},{"lineNumber":233384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、ヒーローも頑張ってね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"So Hero, do your best too!"},{"lineNumber":233385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……にーちゃん達も出るってなると……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... If big brothers are also entering..."},{"lineNumber":233386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オイラ、自信ないなぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t have confidence..."},{"lineNumber":233387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前はちっと、","translatedEnglishLine":"You should get a little"},{"lineNumber":233388,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こーゆー荒事に慣れた方がいいからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"more used to rough stuff like this."},{"lineNumber":233389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「に、にーちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"B-big brother..."},{"lineNumber":233390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに俺は本気出したお前もブチのめしたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, I want to beat you when you're serious too."},{"lineNumber":233391,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひいっ！　にーちゃんが本気だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Eek! Big brother’s serious!"},{"lineNumber":233392,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ピーピー泣き言を言わない。","translatedEnglishLine":"No whining and crying."},{"lineNumber":233393,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたが負けたら、パートナーである私が","translatedEnglishLine":"If you lose, I, your partner,"},{"lineNumber":233394,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひどい目に遭わされるんだから」","translatedEnglishLine":"will have a terrible time."},{"lineNumber":233395,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うん……そうだね……","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yeah... that's true..."},{"lineNumber":233396,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オイラ、頑張ってみるよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll try my best."},{"lineNumber":233397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それから、僕も出るよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, I will participate."},{"lineNumber":233398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パートナーは私だー。","translatedEnglishLine":"My partner is me."},{"lineNumber":233399,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふふふ、このコンビに君達は勝てるかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, can you guys beat this duo?"},{"lineNumber":233400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦うのは僕だけですよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m the only one fighting, okay?"},{"lineNumber":233401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに俺も出るぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, I’m entering too!"},{"lineNumber":233402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":233403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":233404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、とか、うーん、とか！","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? And hmm?!"},{"lineNumber":233405,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんなんすか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s that about!?"},{"lineNumber":233406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、だって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, because..."},{"lineNumber":233407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと待って。","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a minute."},{"lineNumber":233408,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出るのはいいけどパートナーは誰なの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s fine that you join, but who’s your partner?"},{"lineNumber":233409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、それあたし」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, that’s me."},{"lineNumber":233410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パートナー探しに困ってうろうろしてたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"He was wandering around troubled looking for a partner,"},{"lineNumber":233411,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあいいかなって」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I thought, well, it’s fine."},{"lineNumber":233412,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ミックス！　もっと自分を大事になさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix! Take better care of yourself!"},{"lineNumber":233413,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやいやいや、どういう意味っすか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, no, no, what do you mean by that!?"},{"lineNumber":233414,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺だってここまで一緒に冒険してきたんすよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve been adventuring together all this way too!"},{"lineNumber":233415,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょ、ちょっとくらいは……","translatedEnglishLine":"So, at least a little..."},{"lineNumber":233416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく見てて下さい！","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, please watch!"},{"lineNumber":233417,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺、やるときはやるハニーなんで！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m a honey who gets it done when it counts!"},{"lineNumber":233418,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、妙にやる気満々だし。","translatedEnglishLine":"And, he’s strangely full of enthusiasm."},{"lineNumber":233419,"originalJapaneseLine":"　放置すんのも可哀想だったから」","translatedEnglishLine":"I felt sorry to just leave him alone."},{"lineNumber":233420,"originalJapaneseLine":"……はあ。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Sigh."},{"lineNumber":233421,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミックスが決めたことなら口出しは出来ないが","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t interfere if Mix decided it,"},{"lineNumber":233422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、何故急に参加を？」","translatedEnglishLine":"But, why suddenly join?"},{"lineNumber":233423,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん？　俺が参加する理由？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm? The reason I’m joining?"},{"lineNumber":233424,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":233425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへ、まだ秘密かな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, it’s still a secret."},{"lineNumber":233426,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特に＜エール＞には","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially from 'Yell'."},{"lineNumber":233427,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君はよく分からないことを言っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun was saying something hard to understand."},{"lineNumber":233428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、これで今やること終わりだよね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, that’s everything to do for now, right!"},{"lineNumber":233429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「街見て回ってくるね！","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m going to look around the town!"},{"lineNumber":233430,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒーロー、行っくよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero, let’s go!"},{"lineNumber":233431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レリコフ、待ちなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rerikov, wait."}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a life experience, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お婆ちゃんもうなんでもいい人なの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grandma, are you just fine with anything now!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい！　ボクも出るよー！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, I've been told my partner

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクで平気って言われちゃった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be me, so it's okay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、オイラ、こういうの出たくないんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I don’t want to join something like this though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……レリコフとザンスにーちゃんが出ろって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... Rerikov and Zans big brother are telling me to enter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローは強いんだから勝てるよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero is strong, so we can win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンおじさんが優勝したことあるんだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uncle Patton once won this tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、ヒーローも頑張ってね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So Hero, do your best too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……にーちゃん達も出るってなると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... If big brothers are also entering...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こーゆー荒事に慣れた方がいいからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: more used to rough stuff like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに俺は本気出したお前もブチのめしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I want to beat you when you're serious too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひいっ！　にーちゃんが本気だ！」
「ピーピー泣き言を言わない。
あんたが負けたら、パートナーである私が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you lose, I, your partner,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい目に遭わされるんだから」
オイラ、頑張ってみるよ」
ふふふ、このコンビに君達は勝てるかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, can you guys beat this duo?
I’m the only one fighting, okay?
By the way, I’m entering too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出るのはいいけどパートナーは誰なの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s fine that you join, but who’s your partner?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パートナー探しに困ってうろうろしてたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was wandering around troubled looking for a partner,
so I thought, well, it’s fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ミックス！　もっと自分を大事になさい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix! Take better care of yourself!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやいやいや、どういう意味っすか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, no, what do you mean by that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺だってここまで一緒に冒険してきたんすよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve been adventuring together all this way too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、ちょっとくらいは……
俺、やるときはやるハニーなんで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m a honey who gets it done when it counts!
And, he’s strangely full of enthusiasm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放置すんのも可哀想だったから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I felt sorry to just leave him alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスが決めたことなら口出しは出来ないが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t interfere if Mix decided it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？　俺が参加する理由？」
長田君はよく分からないことを言っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun was saying something hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、これで今やること終わりだよね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, that’s everything to do for now, right!
I’m going to look around the town!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お婆ちゃんもうなんでもいい人なの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grandma, are you just fine with anything now!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい！　ボクも出るよー！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, I've been told my partner

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクで平気って言われちゃった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be me, so it's okay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、オイラ、こういうの出たくないんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I don’t want to join something like this though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……レリコフとザンスにーちゃんが出ろって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... Rerikov and Zans big brother are telling me to enter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローは強いんだから勝てるよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero is strong, so we can win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンおじさんが優勝したことあるんだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uncle Patton once won this tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、ヒーローも頑張ってね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So Hero, do your best too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……にーちゃん達も出るってなると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... If big brothers are also entering...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こーゆー荒事に慣れた方がいいからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: more used to rough stuff like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに俺は本気出したお前もブチのめしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I want to beat you when you're serious too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひいっ！　にーちゃんが本気だ！」
「ピーピー泣き言を言わない。
あんたが負けたら、パートナーである私が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you lose, I, your partner,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい目に遭わされるんだから」
オイラ、頑張ってみるよ」
ふふふ、このコンビに君達は勝てるかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, can you guys beat this duo?
I’m the only one fighting, okay?
By the way, I’m entering too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出るのはいいけどパートナーは誰なの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s fine that you join, but who’s your partner?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パートナー探しに困ってうろうろしてたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was wandering around troubled looking for a partner,
so I thought, well, it’s fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ミックス！　もっと自分を大事になさい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix! Take better care of yourself!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやいやいや、どういう意味っすか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, no, what do you mean by that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺だってここまで一緒に冒険してきたんすよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve been adventuring together all this way too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、ちょっとくらいは……
俺、やるときはやるハニーなんで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m a honey who gets it done when it counts!
And, he’s strangely full of enthusiasm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放置すんのも可哀想だったから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I felt sorry to just leave him alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスが決めたことなら口出しは出来ないが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t interfere if Mix decided it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？　俺が参加する理由？」
長田君はよく分からないことを言っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun was saying something hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、これで今やること終わりだよね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, that’s everything to do for now, right!
I’m going to look around the town!
